services.description: List all Developer Cloud Service instances

serviceName.description: This is the unique name used to identify the instance in the tenant domain

create-service.description: Create new tenant service within Developer Cloud Service POD

serviceName.description: This is the unique name used to identify the instance in the tenant domain

serviceDescription.description: This is a optional description that is used to help identify the purpose for this service

serviceLevel.description: This is the level of service provided for this service.

tags.description: Assign tags to the service instance.

serviceVersion.description: Service version of the service to create

edition.description: Select the Edition of the service to create

noRollback.description: This parameter, when set to true disables rollback in case of failure - this is helpful for debugging purposes, as the resources would not get cleaned up. Default is 'false'.

systemName.description: System on which the resources for the service will be allocated from

managedSystemType.description: Is the system Oracle Managed or User Managed. Default is 'user'.

isMultiTenant.description: Does the system host services for multiple accounts. Default is 'false'.

enableNotification.description: Select to enable email notifications for your service. Default is 'false'.

isActive.description: Service is available for provisioning the topic services. applicable only if the service is Oracle Managed. Default is 'true'.

isBYOL.description: Leverage your on-premises licenses aka BYOL (Oracle Database and Oracle Weblogic etc.) when spin up Cloud Service instances in the PAYG or Monthly Commit purchase models. Default is 'false'.

serviceEntitlementId.description: This is the entitlement id used to identify the service in the tenant account

subscriptionId.description: The subscription id used to identify the entitlement that will be used for service creation.

identityStripe.description: The stripe is used to identify users and resources associated with the provisioned service instance.

placementTags.description: A list of tags which must be found on matching systems for oracle managed services

assignPublicIP.description: Assign Public IP Address to Service Instance Nodes. Default is 'true'.

standbyRegion.description: Name of the standby Compute Region.

useOAuthForStorage.description: Use OAuth to authenticate with Cloud Storage Service

noRetry.description: This parameter, when set to true disables the provisioning retry in case of failures. Default is 'false'.

create-service.example: psm DevServiceApp create-service -s ExampleInstance -v serviceLevel -i serviceVersion -d edition

serviceName.description: Name of the Developer Cloud Service instance

force.description: The service deletion uses the force option and ignores any PaaS script failures. Default is 'false'.

operation-status.description: View status of Developer Cloud Service instance operation

activities.description: View activities for Developer Cloud Service instance

serviceName.description: Name of the Developer Cloud Service instance

fromStartDate.description: Get activities that were created after this date. Can be used along with 'toStartDate' to get activities created within a date range. Supported date formats are yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ, yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss and yyyy-MM-dd

toStartDate.description: Get activities that were created before this date. Can be used along with 'fromStartDate' to get activities created within a date range. Supported date formats are yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ, yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss and yyyy-MM-dd

limitRowCount.description: Maximum number of activities to display. Default is 10.

offset.description: Include activities starting at this position in the result set. 'offset' in combination with 'limitRowCount' allows to get a subset of activities.

orderBy.description: Order by filter criteria. Supported format is fieldName:(asc/desc).
